name: 隨機程序
syllabus:
Introduction (Week 1)

Derived random variables  (Week 2)

Sum of two random variables (Week 3)

Conditional expected value (Week 4)

Conditioning by a random variable (Week 5)

Expected value of sums (Week 6)

Moment generating function (Week 7)

Midterms (Week 8)

Hypothesis test (Week 9)

Minimum mean square error estimation (Week 10)

MAP and ML estimate (Week 11)

Linear estimation (Week 12)

Stochastic process (Week 13)

Expected value and correlation (Week 14)

Wide sense stationary (Week 15)

Final exam (Week 16)

\*Linear filtering (Week 17)

\*Power spectral density (Week 18)
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
